entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
